resources.string: Fan made application. Not associated with Frontier Developments PLC

Single Route Planner is for one way trips. Note: you will to know the spatial location of the system you need want to go to. The Loop Route Planner will make a loop to a number of legs and then will send you back to the system you started in. Note: Number of legs needs to be greater than 2.

This screen is for systems that require permits to enter. If you have permits to any of the following systems please check them and the router will include them in it\'s calculations. Otherwise, the router will ignore these systems.
Enter the location of the system below
Check below if you do not want to wait for refresh of the starport\'s supply. Note: This is a halving of the max allotment to estimate what you could receive in one allotment of a starport.
